ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Yet those who are kafir insist on their denial
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet the infidels persist in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The unbelievers are indeed engaged in denying it, calling it a lie,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In fact, the disbelievers had always rejected (Our revelations).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact the disbelievers are in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! those who disbelieve are in (the act of) giving the lie to the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but the unbelievers still cry lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but those who disbelieve live in denial
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet those who deny the truth persist in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But those who disbelieve are engaged in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the faithless dwell in denial,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! The disbelievers (persisted) in denying (Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) and his Message of Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:19] Nay, but the disbelievers are [engrossed] in denial, of the mentioned;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but those who disbelieve) the disbelievers of Mecca (live in denial) of Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
